data.name: Tikus Tales
data.detailed_description:
Tikus Tales is a colorful 3D action/platformer full of obstacles, interesting puzzles and fights.

You play as Tikus, a mouse who unwillingly gets chosen by an alien race to track down one of their corrupted leaders and take him down. The aliens' advanced technology grants Tikus super-mouse abilities, in addition to enhancing his battle prowess. Tikus must master his skills and various weapons if he ever hopes to return to his mundane life of enjoying cheese and being an ordinary mouse.

Jump, roll, climb and grapple your way through worlds of varying themes, ranging from semi-realistic ones like an ordinary house to outrageous ones like sky islands and lava filled caves. Face off against weaklings and powerful enemies, and collect resources that can be exchanged for various items in the in-game shop. Befriend other critters to aid in your adventures and solve puzzles designed to hinder your advancement. Become an expert mouse, and show the aliens that no task is too big!

Key features of the game include:
- Colorful Worlds: Deliberately crafted in a low-poly style to be as pleasing to the eyes as possible
- Cute Enemies: Including, but not limited to squishy birds and ghostly teddies
- Challenging Boss Fights: Designed to test your skills and reflexes
- Secrets: For you to find out!

data.short_description: A 3d action/platformer game featuring a mouse wielding a spork as the protaganist. Run, roll and jump your way through colorful worlds, solving puzzles and facing off against various foes along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
